Control Name: Addresses Deviations in a Timely Manner—Deviations from the entity’s expected standards of conduct are identified and remedied in a timely and consistent manner.

control_attributes.Control: Addresses Deviations in a Timely Manner—Deviations from the entity’s expected standards of conduct are identified and remedied in a timely and consistent manner.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC1.1 COSO Principle 1: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values.
